name: Familiar (Jekadu)
description:
A short game developed for the Spelmekanik (SPM) 2021 course (Game Mechanics) as part of the game development program at the DSV institution at Stockholm University.

You're a wizard's familiar trying to help your master escape from a castle. Pick up stuff, zap enemies, avoid guards.

Controls

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera

Space: Jump

Left mouse button: Attack (when unlocked), interact with code panel (context sensitive)

Right mouse button: Carry/drop items

C: Bring up code panel (context sensitive)

P: Arachnophobia mode

Escape: Menu

Credits Programming

Maxime Lebrot

Simon Canbäck

Design

Astrid Pehrsson Ankarstrand

Emil Bernstorf

Emil Lorenzo Moqvist

Hanna Hellberg

Voice acting

The Wizard: Alfred Gauffin

Spider: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/insects/animated-low-poly-spider-125114

Medieval Plague Doctor & Open Book (guard + doodad): https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/lowpoly-medieval-plague-doctor-free-pack-176809
